question: "Guasha", "Die Da", "Qigong", "Tui Na" are the traditional medical practices of which nation?
explanation: Guasha, Die Da, Qigong and Tui Na are the traditional Chinese medical practices. These medical practices have more than 3500 years of history. These practices, along with herbal medicine, acupuncture, cupping therapy, give more importance to the body's balance and vital energy flow to stabilise body organs and functions.
